Text:
"CAM2DVD"? Wtf is that?? 

Oh i see.... you doubled the filesize so it would take twice as long to download. Thanx so much!

ahmed04 wrote the same exact remark on many torrents...spammer. 
as for michaelrwatson, it's dvd format.(dvdr) conversion is done already. not the mp4 or avi as other torrents. sooooo if making a dvd you can skip 2hrs of encoding. btw awesome movie..i watched on movie2k. will download also to share with others.
